description.originalText: Amanda has cared for our two children for the last two years with attention, skillfulness and dedication. She is particularly skilled at helping teach emotion regulation to young children and has a comprehensive understanding of sensory issues. She is unfazed by the challenges that young children can sometimes pose and handles difficult moments with consistency and clear direction. Our children adore her and she has remained an important presence in their lives even as they have come to depend on her less as they have grown. She plans ahead and always has rewarding projects and experiences for our kids. She picks them up from school, schleps them wherever they need to be, does their baths and nighttime routine, including weekly date nights. She handles all of this independently, without need for our intervention or assistance. She will be an invaluable asset to your family as you navigate the complexities and joys of childhood.

description.displayText: I can't say enough positive things about Amanda. Besides being friendly, punctual, dependable and a good communicator she made every visit with my 1 year old daughter special, fun, and comfortable. We had Amanda come for many date nights and our daughter was always happy and excited to see her. She left our home cleaner than when we left and our daughter would talk about her for days after each visit. Highly highly recommend.
description.originalText: I can't say enough positive things about Amanda. Besides being friendly, punctual, dependable and a good communicator she made every visit with my 1 year old daughter special, fun, and comfortable. description.displayText: Amanda has been our full time nanny for over 6 years, starting when our son was 3 (now 9), and staying with us through the birth of our daughter, now 5. She is extremely professional, loves being a nanny, and it shows in everything that she does. She has created a warm, playful, but also wonderfully balanced, structured environment for our children over the last 6 years. She deserves all the credit in the world for helping to raise our children to be the kind, thoughtful, polite when they should be, awesome kids they have grown up to be. Amanda's range in knowing how best to engage, and have fun with children of all ages is remarkable. Her ease with a newborn, while juggling a toddler's needs (including some medical and mental health issues with both kids) always blew me away. She views her role as a meaningful part of a child's development - part teacher, part playmate, part disciplinarian and knows how to beautifully execute all that in equal parts. Amanda is simply extraordinary.

description.displayText:
Amanda helped care for our 3 year old daughter while we attended some wedding events in Brooklyn. She was incredibly accommodating and flexible when our daughter got overwhelmed at the wedding and needed to leave earlier than planned. 

Our daughter absolutely loved her as well! She still talks about Ms. Amanda and the fun crafts they did together. I would absolutely recommend her. She was kind, patient, and our daughter had a blast with her.

description.displayText: Amanda watch our boys while visiting NYC.  She was simply amazing!  Our boys immediately warmed to her as she was engaging and patient in playing with them.  She was very dependable and helped to make our trip even more special.  I would highly recommend Amanda.
description.originalText: Amanda watch our boys while visiting NYC.  She was simply amazing!  Our boys immediately warmed to her as she was engaging and patient in playing with them.  She was very dependable and helped to make our trip even more special.  I would highly recommend Amanda.

description.displayText: Amanda is by far the best sitter we ever had! She was always on time and often available very last minute (at my house within an hour!). She treated my children like family, always coming with little stickers or activities for them. She is friendly and loving. I wish we didn't have to move and could have kept having her around!!! You won't be disappointed with this amazing sitter!
description.originalText: Amanda is by far the best sitter we ever had! She was always on time and often available very last minute (at my house within an hour!). She treated my children like family, always coming with little stickers or activities for them. She is friendly and loving. I wish we didn't have to move and could have kept having her around!!! You won't be disappointed with this amazing sitter!

description.displayText: Amanda has been a wonderful babysitter for our 2-year old son! We have used her for numerous date nights. Our son became immediately comfortable with her presence. She always greets him when she comes in and begins to interact with him by playing with him and speaking to him. There have also been times when my husband and I were running late and she was very flexible and accommodating. She is very kind and trustworthy which we believe are the best traits to have in a babysitter! We would highly recommend her. :)

description.displayText: Amanda is a great person and a great babysitter. She has babysat my son since he was born and he is now 9 years old. She is patient, very sweet, always on time. My son enjoys spending time with her. Overall if you're looking for a reliable, sweet and most of all responsible person, Amanda is the right person to babysit your children!
